summary.span: 定义由所有 ASP.NET 服务器控件共享的属性、方法和事件。

span.span: Defines the properties, methods, and events that are shared by all ASP.NET server controls.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 这是当你开发自定义 ASP.NET 服务器控件时，在从派生的主类。This is the primary class that you derive from when you develop custom ASP.NET server controls. 没有任何用户界面 (UI) 特定功能。 does not have any user interface (UI) specific features. 如果创作不具有 UI，或合并呈现其自己的 UI 的其他控件的控件，派生自。If you are authoring a control that does not have a UI, or combines other controls that render their own UI, derive from . 如果创作具有用户界面的控件，派生自或中的任何控件提供适当的起点的命名空间点为您的自定义控件。If you are authoring a control that does have a UI, derive from or any control in the namespace that provides an appropriate starting point for your custom control. 类是所有 ASP.NET 服务器控件，包括自定义控件、 用户控件和页的基类。The class is the base class for all ASP.NET server controls, including custom controls, user controls, and pages. ASP.NET 页是的实例类，该类继承自类，并且处理了.aspx 扩展名的文件的请求。ASP.NET pages are instances of the class, which inherits from the class, and that handle requests for files that have an .aspx extension. 类可以直接或间接使用用户接口的一部分对于应审查你的 Web 应用程序，并为此类后, 接编写安全代码和保护应用程序，请确保最佳做法。The class can directly or indirectly be used as part of the user interface for your Web application, and as such should be scrutinized to make sure best practices for writing secure code and securing applications are followed. 有关这些主题的常规信息，请参阅[Web 应用程序安全威胁概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/88d61678-f84e-4622-ae80-53128821855a)， [NIB： 安全策略最佳实践](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d49bc4d5-efb7-4caa-a2fe-e4d3cec63c05)，和[安全性的基础概念](~/docs/standard/security/key-security-concepts.md)。For general information on these topics, see [Overview of Web Application Security Threats](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/88d61678-f84e-4622-ae80-53128821855a), [NIB: Security Policy Best Practices](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d49bc4d5-efb7-4caa-a2fe-e4d3cec63c05), and [Key Security Concepts](~/docs/standard/security/key-security-concepts.md). 有关详细信息，请参阅[保护标准控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8)，[如何： 显示安全错误消息](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f70ac33-6e11-4e98-ab7d-bae9c0e7eefa)，[如何： 保护对脚本利用在 Web 应用程序中的应用的 HTML编码为字符串](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b)，和[验证控件简介](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3c0e7514-cff2-4bed-936d-ee3f7b740190)。For more specific information, see [Securing Standard Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [How to: Display Safe Error Messages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f70ac33-6e11-4e98-ab7d-bae9c0e7eefa), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), and [Introduction to the Validation Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3c0e7514-cff2-4bed-936d-ee3f7b740190). ## Examples 下面的示例演示一个派生自的自定义服务器控件类。The following example demonstrates a custom server control that derives from the class. `InnerContent`类重写方法中，检查以查看是否类具有任何子控件在页上，并且确定第一个子控件是否为文本的控件。The `InnerContent` class overrides the method, checks to see if the class has any child controls on the page and determines whether the first child of the control is a literal control. 如果满足这两种情况，重写的方法将写入的 HTML 字符串\ 您的消息:，该文本的控件，以及右内容\ 标记添加到 Web 窗体页。If both of these conditions are met, the overridden method writes the HTML string \

Your Message:, the contents of the literal control, and a closing \

tag to the Web Forms page. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-csharp[Classic Control Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Control Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Control Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Control Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除非重写它时，此方法会自动添加的对象添加到服务器控件的对象。Unless you override it, this method automatically adds objects to the server control's object. 此集合是可通过访问属性。This collection is accessible through property. ## Examples 下面的示例是使用的自定义服务器控件方法来确定声明的元素开始标记和结束标记的此控件之间是Web 服务器控件。The following example is a custom server control that uses the method to determine if elements declared between the opening and closing tags of this control are Web server controls. 如果它们是，它们将添加到对象， `items`。If they are, they are added to an object, `items`. 当重写调用方法时，它循环访问并将每个对象添加到的自定义服务器控件。When the overridden method is called, it iterates through the and adds each object in it to the of the custom server control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法设置基于定义主题目录中的外观属性控件上的样式属性。The method sets style properties on the control based on skin properties defined in a theme directory. 应用的外观是控件的默认外观或中指定的外观属性。The skin applied is either the default skin for the control or the skin specified in the property. 方法由 ASP.NET 的声明性放置在页面上的控件。The method is called by ASP.NET for declarative controls placed on a page. 必须调用方法在以编程方式创建的所有控件的运行时间样式表应用于控件外观。You must call the method on any controls created programmatically at run time for style sheet skins to apply to the control. 将自动应用主题外观。Theme skins are applied automatically. 有关主题和级联样式表之间的差异的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information on the difference between themes and cascading style sheets, see [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

span.span: Gathers information about the server control and delivers it to the property to be displayed when tracing is enabled for the page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性将收集有关该页的 UI 层次结构所需的信息，并将其传递到该页面的[<跟踪>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/trace-element.md)属性。This property gathers the information necessary about a page's UI hierarchy and passes it to the page's [<trace>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/trace-element.md) property. 当启用跟踪，页面或应用程序，此信息显示在`Control Tree`跟踪输出的一部分。When you enable tracing, either for a page or for your application, this information is displayed in the `Control Tree` section of the trace output. 页的跟踪输出追加到末尾的页;虽然可以在跟踪查看器 （trace.axd 文件），它存储在应用程序的根目录中查看应用程序的跟踪输出。Trace output for a page is appended to the end of the page; while trace output for an application can be viewed from the trace viewer (trace.axd file) which is stored in the application's root directory. 有关跟踪的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 跟踪概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1552561d-887c-4002-8770-f92662cdf416)。For more information about tracing, see [ASP.NET Tracing Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1552561d-887c-4002-8770-f92662cdf416).

summary.span: 删除服务器控件的子控件的控件状态信息。

span.span: Deletes the control-state information for the server control's child controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建新的子控件后，如数据绑定子模板数据绑定服务器控件中的控件时，写入到父控件的控件状态的子控件状态信息被重写时，使用方法。The method is used when child control-state information written to the parent control's control state is overridden as new child controls are created, such as when data-binding child controls in a templated data-bound server control. 调用到空的子控件之前调用的方法方法，可以减少必须存储或传输的控件状态信息的大小。Calling the method to empty child controls before calling the method reduces the size of the control-state information that must be stored or transmitted. 在重新创建的子控件时对象，请使用方法清除子控件状态，以便它不会无意中将它应用到新的控件。When recreating child controls of a object, use the method to clear child control state so that it does not get applied to the new controls inadvertently. 若要清除的子控件状态和视图状态，使用方法。To clear both the child control state and view state, use the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法清除子控件的所有视图状态和控件状态信息。The method clears all view-state and control-state information for child controls. 它相当于同时调用方法和方法。It is equivalent to calling both the method and the method. 在重新创建的子控件时对象，请使用方法清除子状态，以便它不会无意中将它应用到新的控件。When recreating child controls of a object, use the method to clear child state so that it does not get applied to the new controls inadvertently. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法对于模板化的数据绑定控件。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method for a templated data-bound control. 如果填充控件将绑定到数据源，则控件的集合为空使用方法，与方法用于删除已保存的子控件的任何状态信息。If the data source that the control binds to is populated, the control's collection is emptied using the method, and the method is used to remove any state information that had been saved for the child controls. [!code-csharp[TemplatedDataBoundControl2#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TemplatedDataBoundControl2/cs/templatedataboundcontrol.cs#3)] [!code-vb[TemplatedDataBoundControl2#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TemplatedDataBoundControl2/vb/templatedataboundcontrol.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你重写时，通常使用此方法方法开发模板化数据绑定服务器控件时。This method is commonly used when you override the method when developing templated data-bound server controls. 如果不调用此方法，子控件查看 – 状态信息可以写入父服务器控件，只是为了将数据绑定时被重写。If you do not call this method, child control view–state information can be written to a parent server control, only to be overridden when the data is bound. 在重新创建的子控件时，使用方法清除子视图状态，以便它不会无意中将它应用到新的控件。When recreating child controls of a , use the method to clear child view state so that it does not get applied to the new controls inadvertently. 有关使用此方法的详细信息，请参阅[如何： 创建模板化 ASP.NET 用户控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/07664410-02dd-4494-af53-a9259741d4f2)。For more information about using this method, see [How to: Create Templated ASP.NET User Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/07664410-02dd-4494-af53-a9259741d4f2).

summary.span: 获取由 ASP.NET 生成的 HTML 标记的控件 ID。

span.span: Gets the control ID for HTML markup that is generated by ASP.NET.

value.span: 由 ASP.NET 生成的 HTML 标记的控件 ID。

span.span: The control ID for HTML markup that is generated by ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 Web 服务器控件呈现为 HTML 元素，`id`的 HTML 元素的属性设置的值为属性。When a Web server control is rendered as an HTML element, the `id` attribute of the HTML element is set to the value of the property. 值通常用于通过访问客户端脚本中的 HTML 元素`document.getElementById`方法。The value is often used to access the HTML element in client script by using the `document.getElementById` method. ID 通常还在 CSS 规则用于指定元素的样式。The ID is also often used in CSS rules to specify elements to style. 例如，以下 CSS 样式规则选择所有`span`元素具有`id`属性的值`ProductIDLabel`并设置其`background-color`属性设为`white`:For example, the following CSS style rule selects all `span` elements that have the `id` attribute value of `ProductIDLabel` and sets their `background-color` attribute to `white`: ``` span#ProductIDLabel { background-color: white; } ``` ASP.NET 提供了有关如何生成多个算法属性值。ASP.NET provides multiple algorithms for how to generate the property value. 你选择哪种算法使用的控件，通过设置其属性。You select which algorithm to use for a control by setting its property. 算法由下表中列出的枚举值。The algorithms are identified by the enumeration values that are listed in the following table. |“值”Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| || 值是通过串联每个父命名容器的 值生成的，这些父命名容器都具有控件的 值。The value is generated by concatenating the values of each parent naming container with the value of the control. 在呈现控件的多个实例的数据绑定方案中，将在控件的 值的前面插入递增的值。In data-binding scenarios where multiple instances of a control are rendered, an incrementing value is inserted in front of the control's value. 各部分之间用下划线字符 (_) 分隔。Each segment is separated by an underscore character (_). 此算法的 ASP.NET 的版本早于 ASP.NET 4 中使用。This algorithm was used in versions of ASP.NET earlier than ASP.NET 4.| || 值设置为 属性的值。The value is set to the value of the property. 如果控件是命名容器，则该控件将用作其所包含的任何控件的命名容器的顶层。If the control is a naming container, the control is used as the top of the hierarchy of naming containers for any controls that it contains.| ||对于数据绑定控件中的控件使用此算法。This algorithm is used for controls that are in data-bound controls. 值是通过串联每个父命名容器的 值生成的，这些父命名容器都具有控件的 值。The value is generated by concatenating the value of the parent naming container with the value of the control. 如果控件是生成多个行的数据绑定控件，则在末尾添加 属性中指定的数据字段的值。If the control is a data-bound control that generates multiple rows, the value of the data field specified in the property is added at the end. 对于 控件，可以指定多个数据字段。For the control, multiple data fields can be specified. 如果属性为空，而不是数据字段值末尾添加序列号。If the property is blank, a sequential number is added at the end instead of a data-field value. 各部分之间用下划线字符 (_) 分隔。Each segment is separated by an underscore character (_).| ||控件继承其 控件的 设置。The control inherits the setting of its control.| 默认值页为。The default value of for a page is . 默认值控件为。The default value of for a control is . 因为控件的默认值是、 模式的默认代。Because the default for controls is , the default generation mode is . (但是，如果你使用 Visual Studio 将 Web 项目转换为 ASP.NET 4 中，从早期版本，Visual Studio 自动设置站点默认值为Web.config 文件中。)(However, if you use Visual Studio to convert a Web project to ASP.NET 4 from an earlier version, Visual Studio automatically sets the site default to in the Web.config file.) 有关详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET Web 服务器控件标识](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/45a8c3ef-5ac7-48f1-862a-0cd5073742e7)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Server Control Identification](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/45a8c3ef-5ac7-48f1-862a-0cd5073742e7). ## Examples 下面的示例演示母版页的内容页中 Web 用户控件。The following examples show a Web user control that is inside a content page for a master page. 用户控件包含控件和控件。The user control contains a control and a control. 在显示的文本控件由用户从选择的值控件。The text that is displayed in the control is determined by the value that the user selects from the control. 以便网页上无需将发布回服务器才能设置此值，通过客户端脚本设置的文本值。The text value is set through client script so that the Web page does not have to post back to the server in order to set this value. 若要获取对为呈现的 HTML 元素的引用控件在客户端脚本中，你必须知道控件的值属性。To get a reference to the HTML element that is rendered for the control in client script, you must know the value of the control's property. 但是，因为该用户控件在网页中可以添加到任何位置，则无法事先知道哪些命名的容器将包含该控件。However, because the user control can be put anywhere in a Web page, it is impossible to know in advance which naming containers will contain the controls. 若要确保值将是相同值，该代码设置值赋给。To make sure that the value will be the same as the value, the code sets the value to . 下面的示例显示用户控件。The following example shows the user control. 下面的示例演示包含用户控件的内容页。The following example shows the content page that contains the user control. 下面的示例演示母版页包含内容页。The following example shows the master page that contains the content page.

(但是，如果你使用 Visual Studio 将 Web 项目转换为 ASP.NET 4 中，从早期版本，Visual Studio 自动设置站点默认值为Web.config 文件中。)(However, if you use Visual Studio to convert a Web project to ASP.NET 4 from an earlier version, Visual Studio automatically sets the site default to in the Web.config file.) 有关详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET Web 服务器控件标识](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/45a8c3ef-5ac7-48f1-862a-0cd5073742e7)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Server Control Identification](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/45a8c3ef-5ac7-48f1-862a-0cd5073742e7). ## Examples 下面的示例演示中包含的控件控件。The following example shows controls that are contained in a control. 上控件，属性设置为和属性设置为`ProductID`。On the control, the property is set to and the property is set to `ProductID`. 在呈现的 HTML 中，这将创建三个`span`对应于三个元素的`ProductIDLabel`控件。In the rendered HTML, this creates three `span` elements that correspond to three `ProductIDLabel` controls. 当运行此页，则`id`属性`span`元素设置为以下值：When the page runs, the `id` attributes for the `span` elements are set to the following values: - `ListView1_ProductIDLabel_1` - `ListView1_ProductIDLabel_34` - `ListView1_ProductIDLabel_43`

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 ASP.NET 页上，在开始标记和结束标记的一个服务器控件之间以声明方式添加控件时 ASP.NET 自动将这些控件添加到包含服务器控件的。On an ASP.NET page, when controls are added declaratively between the opening and closing tags of a server control, ASP.NET automatically adds the controls to the containing server control's . 任何 HTML 标记或不在服务器处理的文本字符串将被视为对象。Any HTML tags or text strings that are not processed on the server are treated as objects. 这些将添加到与其他服务器控件的集合。These are added to the collection like other server controls. 属性允许您以编程方式访问的实例任何服务器控件的类。The property allows you programmatic access to the instance of the class for any server control. 你可以将控件添加到集合、 从集合中，删除控件或循环访问集合中的服务器控件。You can add controls to the collection, remove controls from the collection, or iterate through the server controls in the collection. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将子控件添加到服务器控件的对象通过其属性。The following example demonstrates how to add child controls to a server control's object through its property. [!code-csharp[Classic Control.Controls Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Control.Controls Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Control.Controls Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Control.Controls Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Furthermore, if you are planning to add controls to the controls collection programmatically, consider adding the controls in an overridden method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你开发复合或模板化服务器控件时，必须重写此方法。When you develop a composite or templated server control, you must override this method. 控制该替代方法应实现接口以避免命名冲突。Controls that override the method should implement the interface to avoid naming conflicts. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Web 服务器控件模板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f769d290-fd04-4084-85fc-4ea30dd2e8ae)和[开发自定义 ASP.NET 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fbe26c16-cff4-4089-b3dd-877411f0c0ef)。For more information, see [Web Server Controls Templates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f769d290-fd04-4084-85fc-4ea30dd2e8ae) and [Developing Custom ASP.NET Server Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fbe26c16-cff4-4089-b3dd-877411f0c0ef). ## Examples 下面的示例演示的重写的版本方法。The following example demonstrates an overridden version of the method. 在此实现中，该复合控件将显示括在呈现的 HTML 的两个文本控件的控件。In this implementation, the composite control displays a control enclosed in two literal controls that render HTML. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-csharp[SystemWebUIControl CreateChildControls and EnsureChildControls#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SystemWebUIControl CreateChildControls and EnsureChildControls/CS/compositecontrolsample1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[SystemWebUIControl CreateChildControls and EnsureChildControls#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SystemWebUIControl CreateChildControls and EnsureChildControls/VB/compositecontrolsample1.vb#2)]

summary.span: 将数据源绑定到调用的服务器控件及其所有子控件。

span.span: Binds a data source to the invoked server control and all its child controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法将数据从源绑定到服务器控件。Use this method to bind data from a source to a server control. 在检索通过数据库查询的数据集之后，通常使用此方法。This method is commonly used after retrieving a dataset through a database query. 大多数控件自动执行数据绑定，这意味着，你通常不需要显式调用此方法。Most controls perform data binding automatically, which means that you typically do not need to call this method explicitly. 创建自定义模板化的数据绑定控件时，通常是重写此方法。This method is commonly overridden when you create a custom templated data-bound control. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 创建模板化 ASP.NET 用户控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/07664410-02dd-4494-af53-a9259741d4f2)和[开发自定义数据绑定 Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/88fe02a3-957f-4ff7-84f5-2d7ab78db4c1)。For more information, see [How to: Create Templated ASP.NET User Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/07664410-02dd-4494-af53-a9259741d4f2) and [Developing Custom Data-Bound Web Server Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/88fe02a3-957f-4ff7-84f5-2d7ab78db4c1). 当在服务器控件上调用，此方法会解析所有数据绑定表达式中的服务器控件和任何其子控件中。When called on a server control, this method resolves all data-binding expressions in the server control and in any of its child controls. ## Examples 下面的示例重写自定义的 ASP.NET 服务器控件中的方法。The following example overrides the method in a custom ASP.NET server control. 它首先调用基方法，然后使用方法来删除所有子控件和方法以都删除所有视图状态的设置保存这些子控件。It begins by calling the base method and then uses the method to delete all the child controls and the method to delete any saved view-state settings for those child controls. 最后，属性设置为`true`和指示该控件将跟踪对与新创建的控件的视图状态的任何更改方法。Finally, the property is set to `true` and the control is instructed to track any changes to the view state of the newly created controls with the method. 这是一种常用技术时将数据绑定到一个控件，用于确保新数据与从以前存储的数据不冲突方法调用。This is a common technique when binding data to a control to ensure that new data does not conflict with data stored from a previous method call. [!code-csharp[Control_StateManagement#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Control_StateManagement/CS/control_state.cs#6)] [!code-vb[Control_StateManagement#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Control_StateManagement/VB/control_state.vb#6)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指示是否为指定的控件启用主题。The property indicates whether themes are enabled for a specified control. 当属性是`true`，应用程序的主题目录中搜索要应用的控件外观。When the property is `true`, the application's theme directory is searched for control skins to apply. 如果用于特定的控件中的主题目录存在，则不会应用外观。If no skin for the particular control exists in the theme directory, skins are not applied. 当属性是`false`，则不搜索主题目录和的内容未使用属性。When the property is `false`, the theme directory is not searched and the content of the property is not used. 可以在页、 容器或控制级别启用主题。Themes can be enabled at the page, container, or control level. 控件可以重写值集，通过其父控件，或包含的页。A control can override the value set by its parent control, or by the containing page.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示服务器控件是否向发出请求的客户端保持自己的视图状态以及它所包含的任何子控件的视图状态。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the server control persists its view state, and the view state of any child controls it contains, to the requesting client.

value.span: 如果服务器控件保持其视图状态，则否 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the server control maintains its view state; otherwise .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 视图状态使服务器控件能够在 HTTP 请求之间保持其状态。View state enables a server control to maintain its state across HTTP requests. 启用了控件的视图状态，如果满足所有以下条件：View state for a control is enabled if all of the following conditions are met: - 页的属性设置为`true`。The property for the page is set to `true`. - 控件的属性设置为`true`。The property for the control is set to `true`. - 控件的属性设置为或继承设置。The property for the control is set to or inherits the setting. 有关更多信息，请参见 属性。For more information, see the property. 服务器控件的视图状态是其所有属性值的累计。A server control's view state is the accumulation of all its property values. 为了在 HTTP 请求之间保留这些值，ASP.NET 使用的实例类来存储属性值。In order to preserve these values across HTTP requests, ASP.NET uses an instance of the class to store the property values. 值时处理后续请求中作为变量传递到隐藏的字段。The values are then passed as a variable to a hidden field when subsequent requests are processed. 有关视图状态的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 视图状态概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/19d2a6ed-9a77-4c7c-a7f5-74dd4b6c3818)。For more information about view state, see [ASP.NET View State Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/19d2a6ed-9a77-4c7c-a7f5-74dd4b6c3818). 有的时间不适当禁用视图状态，特别是要提高应用程序性能。There are times when it is appropriate to disable view state, particularly to improve application performance. 例如，如果你将数据库请求加载到服务器控件中，将此属性设置为`false`。For example, if you are loading a database request into a server control, set this property to `false`. 如果不这样做，将加载到只能由数据库查询重写服务器控件的视图状态浪费处理器时间。If you do not, processor time will be wasted loading view state into the server control that will only be overridden by the database query. 如果是`false`，你可以使用的控件状态保存是特定于控件，无法关闭与视图状态属性一样的属性信息。If is `false`, you can use the control state to persist property information that is specific to a control and cannot be turned off like the view state property. 有关控件状态和视图状态之间的差异的详细信息，请参阅[控件状态 vs。视图状态示例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9e98c7de-a888-48df-b14e-02ec8bef7681)。For more information on the difference between control state and view state, see [Control State vs. View State Example](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9e98c7de-a888-48df-b14e-02ec8bef7681). 有关如何启用或禁用以声明方式为 ASP.NET 页的视图状态的信息，请参阅。For information about how to enable or disable view state declaratively for an ASP.NET page, see . ## Examples 下面的示例设置属性`false`。The following example sets the property to `false`. [!code-csharp[Control_StateManagement#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Control_StateManagement/CS/control_statemanagement.cs.aspx#7)] [!code-vb[Control_StateManagement#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Control_StateManagement/VB/control_statemanagement.vb.aspx#7)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法首先检查的当前值属性。This method first checks the current value of the property. 如果此值为`false`、调用方法。If this value is `false`, the method is called. 方法通常用在复合控件，此外，对于某些使用子控件的控件或其所有的功能。The method is typically used in composite controls, which are controls that use child controls for some or all their functionality. 为了确保子控件已创建并准备好处理输入，以执行数据绑定，或执行其他任务调用方法。The method is called in order to make sure that child controls have been created and are ready to process input, to perform data binding, or to perform other tasks. 控件是复合控件的一个示例。The control is an example of a composite control. 它将创建子控件例如， ， ， ，和控件，用于呈现 HTML 表生成。It creates child controls such as , , , , and controls, which are used to render the HTML table that the generates. 在大多数情况下，自定义服务器控件开发人员无需重写此方法。In most cases, custom server control developers do not have to override this method. 如果你重写此方法，它的方式使用类似于默认行为。If you do override this method, use it in a way similar to the default behavior. ## Examples 下面的示例使用方法，以确保当前的服务器控件具有子控件。The following example uses the method to ensure that the current server control has child controls. 然后它获取或设置子属性Web 控件中当前服务器控件的对象。It then gets or sets a property for a child Web control in the current server control's object. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-csharp[SystemWebUIControl CreateChildControls and EnsureChildControls#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SystemWebUIControl CreateChildControls and EnsureChildControls/CS/compositecontrolsample1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SystemWebUIControl CreateChildControls and EnsureChildControls#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SystemWebUIControl CreateChildControls and EnsureChildControls/VB/compositecontrolsample1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用来从函数在代码隐藏页中，若要访问另一个容器内的控件或在其他情况下，目标控件不直接访问调用方的访问控制。Use to access a control from a function in a code-behind page, to access a control that is inside another container, or in other circumstances where the target control is not directly accessible to the caller. 此方法将查找控件仅当控件直接包含由指定的容器;即，该方法不会搜索整个层次结构中的控件内的控件。This method will find a control only if the control is directly contained by the specified container; that is, the method does not search throughout a hierarchy of controls within controls. 有关如何查找控件，你不知道其即时容器时的信息，请参阅[如何： 按 ID 访问服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/59964ef8-72ef-4159-9f1a-5b230ff46fb3)。For information about how to find a control when you do not know its immediate container, see [How to: Access Server Controls by ID](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/59964ef8-72ef-4159-9f1a-5b230ff46fb3). ## Examples 下面的示例定义`Button1_Click`事件处理程序。The following example defines a `Button1_Click` event handler. 此处理程序调用时，使用方法来查找具有的控件属性`TextBox2`包含页上。When invoked, this handler uses the method to locate a control with an property of `TextBox2` on the containing page. 如果找到了该控件，其父级将确定使用属性并将父控件的写入页。If the control is found, its parent is determined using the property and the parent control's is written to the page. 如果`TextBox2`未找到，则"找不到控件"写入页。If `TextBox2` is not found, "Control Not Found" is written to the page. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法以设置到该控件的网页的最初关注点。Use the method to set the initial focus of the Web page to the control. 将与所选控件在浏览器中打开该页。The page will be opened in the browser with the control selected. 方法使页面焦点脚本的调用来发出上呈现的页面。The method causes a call to the page focus script to be emitted on the rendered page. 如果页不包含具有 HTML 控件`ID`匹配控件属性的方法调用，则不会设置页焦点。If the page does not contain a control with an HTML `ID` attribute that matches the control that the method was invoked on, then page focus will not be set. 将焦点设置用户控件而不是将焦点设置用户控件的子控件上时发生这种的示例。An example where this can occur is when you set the focus on a user control instead of setting the focus on a child control of the user control. 在此方案中，你可以使用方法来查找该用户控件的子控件并调用其方法。In this scenario, you can use the method to find the child control of the user control and invoke its method.

summary.span: 获取或设置分配给服务器控件的编程标识符。

span.span: Gets or sets the programmatic identifier assigned to the server control.

value.span: 分配给控件的编程标识符。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 服务器控件上设置此属性提供以编程方式访问服务器控件的属性、 事件和方法。Setting this property on a server control provides you with programmatic access to the server control's properties, events, and methods. 可以通过声明的 Web 开发人员设置此属性的 ASP.NET 服务器控件的开始标记中的属性。This property can be set by Web developers by declaring an attribute in the opening tag of an ASP.NET server control. 如果未指定的服务器控件，此属性，以声明方式或以编程方式，可以获取对通过其父控件的控件的引用属性。If this property is not specified for a server control, either declaratively or programmatically, you can obtain a reference to the control through its parent control's property. > [!NOTE] > 字母数字字符和下划线字符 (_) 的唯一组合都是此属性的有效值。Only combinations of alphanumeric characters and the underscore character ( _ ) are valid values for this property. 包括空格或者其他无效字符会导致 ASP.NET 页分析器错误。Including spaces or other invalid characters will cause an ASP.NET page parser error. ## Examples [!code-csharp[Control_Sample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Control_Sample/CS/controlclass_samples.cs.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[Control_Sample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Control_Sample/VB/controlclass_samples.vb.aspx#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性的自定义服务器控件示例，请参阅[模板化的服务器控件示例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/986f63b8-6b50-42b9-a62d-a2f13cafa88b)For a sample custom server control that uses this property, see [Templated Server Control Example](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/986f63b8-6b50-42b9-a62d-a2f13cafa88b) ## Examples 下面的示例重写自定义的 ASP.NET 服务器控件中的方法。The following example overrides the method in a custom ASP.NET server control. 它首先调用基方法，然后使用`ControlCollection`对象。It begins by calling the base method and then uses the `ControlCollection` object. 若要删除所有子控件的方法和方法以都删除所有视图状态的设置保存这些子控件。 method to delete all the child controls and the method to delete any saved view-state settings for those child controls. 最后，属性设置为`true`。Finally, the property is set to `true`. 然后，该控件使用属性来确定是否为控件启用视图状态更改跟踪。The control then uses the property to determine whether view-state change tracking is enabled for the control. 如果未启用，调用方法。If it is not enabled, the method is called. summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示是否为该控件启用了视图状态。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether view state is enabled for this control.

value.span: 如果为控件启用了视图状态，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if view state is enabled for the control; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以在页、 容器或控制级别启用视图状态。View state can be enabled at the page, container, or control level. 当在页面或容器级别禁用视图状态时，包含的页面或容器的所有控件禁用了视图状态。When view state is disabled at the page or container level, view state is disabled for all controls contained by the page or container. 属性指示是否通过页、 容器或控件启用视图状态。The property indicates whether view state is enabled by pages, containers, or controls. 之所以属性和属性不同。It is possible for the property and the property to be different. 例如，如果包含控件禁用了视图状态，属性可以是`true`时属性是`false`。For example, if the containing the control has view state disabled, the property can be `true` while the property is `false`.

para.span: 页开发人员将设置属性和属性以指示它们是否都与控件一同使用视图状态。

span.span: Page developers will set the property and the property to indicate whether they are using view state with your control.

para.span: 使用属性和代码来确定是否已启用视图状态，为您的控件和的所有容器的属性。

span.span: Use the property and the property in your code to determine whether view state is enabled for your control and for all containers.

summary.span: 当服务器控件加载到 对象中时发生。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通知服务器控件以执行任何设置为在每个页请求上发生的处理步骤。Notifies the server control to perform any processing steps that are set to occur on each page request. 你可以从此事件中访问视图状态信息和 Web 窗体 POST 数据。You can access view state information and Web form POST data from this event. 你还可以访问该页面的控制层次结构中其他服务器控件。You can also access other server controls within the page's control hierarchy. > [!NOTE] > 如果你设置在控件中的自定义模板`Page_Load`事件，自定义模板中的子控件的文本值将会丢失。If you set a custom template in a control during the `Page_Load` event, the text values of child controls in the custom template will be lost. 这是因为已加载的窗体值。This occurs because the form values have already been loaded. ## Examples [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Control_Load#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Control_Load/CS/control_load.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Control_Load#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Control_Load/VB/control_load.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法主要由.NET Framework 基础结构使用，但不可在代码中直接使用。This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 但是，控件开发人员可以重写此方法以指定自定义服务器控件还原其视图状态的方式。However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce)。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce). ## Examples 下面的示例重写的自定义 ASP.NET 服务器控件的方法。The following example overrides the method for a custom ASP.NET server control. 它将创建数组以包含传递中的视图状态信息`savedState`参数，然后调用基实现的数组的第一个索引位置的方法。It creates an array to contain the view state information passed in the `savedState` parameter, and then calls the base implementation of the method for the first index location of the array. 它将存储在下面的两个索引位置到名为的变量的值分配`UserText`和`PasswordText`分别。It assigns the values stored at the next two index locations to variables named `UserText` and `PasswordText`, respectively. [!code-csharp[Control_StateManagement#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Control_StateManagement/CS/control_state.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Control_StateManagement#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Control_StateManagement/VB/control_state.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，当父控件将视图状态加载到子控件创建，这是通过在父控件中的每个子控件位置集合。By default, when a parent control loads view state into child controls it creates, it does this by the position of each child control in the parent control's collection. 当最初应用视图状态时，所有子控件可能不会已创建。When view state is initially applied, all child controls might not have been created. 在这种情况下，还未创建控件的视图状态保存，并应用更高版本创建的子控件时。In this case, the view state for controls not yet created is saved, and applied when the child controls are created later. 将视图状态应用于其子控件的父控件，必须满足两个条件：For a parent control to apply view state to its child controls, two conditions must be met: - 在回发时，父控件必须创建子控件以在上一个请求的顺序完全相同，以便控件的顺序保持一致。On postback, the parent control must create the child controls in exactly the same order as the previous request so that the order of the controls remains consistent. - 回发后，创建所有子控件必须都添加到父控件的末尾集合。After postback, any child controls created must be added to the end of the parent control's collection. 如果不满足这两个条件，如创建操作的子控件延迟，父控件可以使用加载视图状态。If these two conditions cannot be met, as in the case of the delayed creation of a child control, the parent control can load view state by using . 若要设置属性`true`，使用的父控件的元数据属性。To set the property to `true`, use the metadata attribute for the parent control.

summary.span: 获取对服务器控件的命名容器的引用，此引用创建唯一的命名空间，以区分具有相同 属性值的服务器控件。

span.span: Gets a reference to the server control's naming container, which creates a unique namespace for differentiating between server controls with the same property value.

value.span: 服务器控件的命名容器。

span.span: The server control's naming container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET Web 应用程序中的每页包含控件层次的结构。Each page in an ASP.NET Web application contains a hierarchy of controls. 此层次结构不依赖于与控件是否生成对用户可见的 UI。This hierarchy is not dependent on whether a control generates UI visible to the user. 给定控件的命名容器是其上实现的层次结构中的父控件接口。The naming container for a given control is the parent control above it in the hierarchy that implements the interface. 实现此接口的服务器控件创建的唯一命名空间子服务器控件的属性值。A server control that implements this interface creates a unique namespace for the property values of its child server controls. 你可以使用要获取其父容器的引用的命名容器的子控件的属性。You can use the property of a naming container's child control to get a reference to its parent container. 如果你将 Web 服务器控件绑定到数据，如创建服务器控件的唯一命名空间是特别重要和服务器控件。Creating a unique namespace for server controls is particularly important when you bind Web server controls to data, such as the and server controls. 当数据源中的多个条目创建一个是重复的控件的子级的服务器控件的多个实例时，可确保命名容器的这些子控件的每个实例都具有不会发生冲突的属性值。When multiple entries in the data source create multiple instances of a server control that is a child of the repeating control, the naming container ensures that each instance of these child controls have property values that do not conflict. 页的默认命名容器是实例请求该页面时，将生成的类。The default naming container for a page is the instance of the class that is generated when that page is requested. 属性包含呈现为元素的值`id`的 HTML 标记中的属性。The property contains the value that is rendered as the element's `id` attribute in the HTML markup. 根据分配到的值属性，为生成的值属性可能包含的 ID对象。Depending on the value that you assign to the property, the value that is generated for the property might include the ID of the object. 当你将设置到、值不包括的 ID对象。When you set to , the value does not include the ID of the object. 当你将设置为或、值将包括来自的 ID对象。When you set to either or , the value will include the ID from the object. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET Web 服务器控件标识](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/45a8c3ef-5ac7-48f1-862a-0cd5073742e7)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Server Control Identification](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/45a8c3ef-5ac7-48f1-862a-0cd5073742e7). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性。The following example demonstrates using the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 服务器控件，如，和Web 控件可以包含引发事件的子控件。ASP.NET server controls such as the , and Web controls can contain child controls that raise events. 例如中的每一行控件可以包含动态创建的模板的一个或多个按钮。For example, each row in a control can contain one or more buttons created dynamically by templates. 而不是单独引发事件的每个按钮，嵌套的控件中的事件"冒泡"— 也就是说，它们被发送到命名的容器。Rather than each button raising an event individually, events from the nested controls are "bubbled"—that is, they are sent to the naming container. 命名容器反过来引发调用的泛型事件使用的参数值。The naming container in turn raises a generic event called with parameter values. 这些值，可以确定哪些引发原始事件的单个控件。These values allow you to determine which individual control that raised the original event. 通过对此单个事件做出反应，可以避免无需编写各个子控件的事件处理方法。By responding to this single event, you can avoid having to write individual event-handling methods for child controls. ## Examples 下面的示例重写中自定义 ASP.NET 服务器控件，方法`ParentControl`。The following example overrides the method in a custom ASP.NET server control, `ParentControl`. 子控件时，会调用此方法`ParentControl`调用方法。This method is invoked when a child control of `ParentControl` calls the method. 在此情况下，`ParentControl`类将写入包含 ASP.NET 页中，第一个指出两个字符串，其方法被调用，第二个标识的源控制方法。When this happens, the `ParentControl` class writes two strings to the containing ASP.NET page, the first stating that its method has been called, the second identifying the source control of the method. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Control.RaiseBubbleEvent_OnBubbleEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Control.RaiseBubbleEvent_OnBubbleEvent/CS/bubble.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Control.RaiseBubbleEvent_OnBubbleEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Control.RaiseBubbleEvent_OnBubbleEvent/VB/bubble.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回可以用于读取中指定的文件的内容对象`path`参数。The method returns a object that can be used to read the contents of the file specified in the `path` parameter. Path 参数可以是相对或没有协议根 URL (如"~ / mySite/myFile.txt)，或物理路径，本地 ("c:\mySite\myFile.txt") 或 UNC ("\\\myServer\myFile.txt")。The path parameter can be either a relative or root URL without a protocol (such as "~/mySite/myFile.txt), or a physical path, either local ("c:\mySite\myFile.txt") or UNC ("\\\myServer\myFile.txt"). 方法使用文件访问安全性来控制对指定的文件的访问。The method uses file access security to control access to the specified file. 如果当前的 ASP.NET 用户则无权访问该文件，则不打开文件和异常引发来指示访问被拒绝。If the current ASP.NET user does not have access to the file, then the file is not opened and an exception is thrown to indicate that access was denied. 如果`path`参数指定的相对路径，该异常不包括有关请求的文件的物理路径的信息。If the `path` parameter specified a relative path, the exception does not include information about the physical path to the requested file.

exception.span: 对指定文件的访问被拒绝。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每当请求页时，生成的该页面上的服务器控件层次结构。Whenever a page is requested, a hierarchy of server controls on that page is built. 此属性，可确定当前的服务器控件在该层次结构，并对其的程序的父控件。This property allows you to determine the parent control of the current server control in that hierarchy, and to program against it. ## Examples 下面的示例设置新在页中，对象`myControl1`，在指定的控件方法调用。The following example sets a new object on a page, `myControl1`, to the control specified in a method call. 如果调用返回一个控件，该代码使用属性来标识该控件包含`myControl1`。If the call returns a control, the code uses the property to identify the control that contains `myControl1`. 如果存在父控件，字符串"文本框的父 is"的末端与父控件的属性，并且写入到。If the parent control exists, the string "The parent of the text box is" is concatenated with the property of the parent control and written to the . 如果找到没有父控件，则字符串"控件找不到"编写。If no parent control is found, the string "Control not found" is written. remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 服务器控件，如，和Web 控件可以包含引发事件的子控件。ASP.NET server controls such as the , and Web controls can contain child controls that raise events. 例如中的每一行控件可以包含动态创建的模板的一个或多个按钮。For example, each row in a control can contain one or more buttons created dynamically by templates. 而不是单独引发事件的每个按钮，嵌套的控件中的事件"冒泡"— 也就是说，它们被发送到控件的父级。Rather than each button raising an event individually, events from the nested controls are "bubbled"—that is, they are sent to the control's parent. 父反过来引发调用的泛型事件使用的参数值。The parent in turn raises a generic event called with parameter values. 这些值，可以确定哪些引发原始事件的单个控件。These values allow you to determine which individual control that raised the original event. 通过对此单个事件做出反应，可以避免无需编写各个子控件的事件处理方法。By responding to this single event, you can avoid having to write individual event-handling methods for child controls. 创作的控件时不能重写此方法，可以处理或通过重写引发冒泡的事件方法。While you cannot override this method, controls you author can handle or raise bubbled events by overriding the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建自定义类， `ChildControl`，重写方法来调用方法发送到其父 ASP.NET 服务器控件的事件。The following code example demonstrate how to create a custom class, `ChildControl`, overriding the method to call the method that sends the event to its parent ASP.NET server control. 当用户单击 ASP.NET 页，其中包含的实例中的按钮`ChildControl`，它会发出方法包含的实例的父控件`ChildControl`并将字符串"ChildControl 类 OnClick 方法调用"到页。When the user clicks a button in an ASP.NET page that includes an instance of `ChildControl`, it raises the method on the parent control that contains the instance of `ChildControl` and writes the string "The ChildControl class OnClick method is called" to the page. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Control.RaiseBubbleEvent_OnBubbleEvent#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Control.RaiseBubbleEvent_OnBubbleEvent/CS/bubble.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Control.RaiseBubbleEvent_OnBubbleEvent#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Control.RaiseBubbleEvent_OnBubbleEvent/VB/bubble.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET Web 页是可用在各种设备和浏览器可以从 Web 请求信息。ASP.NET Web pages are usable across a wide range of devices and browsers that can request information from the Web. 属性返回呈现请求设备或浏览器的屏幕上的控件的对象。The property returns the object that renders the control on the requesting device or browser's screen. 有关适配器的详细信息，请参阅[体系结构概述的自适应控件行为](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ff05ae9-4109-4352-929e-ad893895dbff)。For more information about adapters, see [Architectural Overview of Adaptive Control Behavior](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ff05ae9-4109-4352-929e-ad893895dbff). 如果服务器控件的属性设置为`true`对页上，启用跟踪，然后捕获与控件关联的跟踪信息。If a server control's property is set to `true` and tracing is enabled for the page, then trace information associated with the control is captured.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 将此属性设置为的值`controlRenderingCompatibilityVersion`属性`pages`Web.config 文件中的元素。ASP.NET sets this property to the value of the `controlRenderingCompatibilityVersion` attribute of the `pages` element in the Web.config file. 如果`controlRenderingCompatibilityVersion`Web.config 文件中未设置属性，默认值是 ASP.NET 的当前版本。If the `controlRenderingCompatibilityVersion` attribute is not set in the Web.config file, the default value is the current version of ASP.NET. > [!CAUTION] > 没有公共的 set 访问器为此属性，但 set 访问器支持的.NET Framework 基础结构，不宜在代码中直接使用。There is a public set accessor for this property, but the set accessor supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 如果在代码中设置此值，则结果是不可预知的。If you set this value in your code, the effect is unpredictable. 每个版本的 ASP.NET 可能以不同的方式呈现 HTML，从早期版本。Each release of ASP.NET might render HTML differently from earlier releases. 例如，在 ASP.NET 3.5 中，如果属性控件是`false`，默认情况下，ASP.NET 呈现`span`元素其`disabled`属性设置为"disabled"。For example, in ASP.NET 3.5, if the property of a control is `false`, by default, ASP.NET renders a `span` element whose `disabled` attribute is set to "disabled". 在 ASP.NET 4 中，默认情况下，`span`元素呈现的级联样式表 (CSS)`class`特性而不是`disabled`属性。In ASP.NET 4, by default, the `span` element is rendered with a cascading style sheet (CSS) `class` attribute instead of the `disabled` attribute. 这允许您指定的已禁用的控件的外观，避免呈现无效的 HTML。This lets you specify the disabled appearance of the control and avoids rendering invalid HTML. (在 HTML 4.0 和 XHTML 1.1`span`元素不支持`disabled`属性。)(In HTML 4.0 and XHTML 1.1, the `span` element does not support the `disabled` attribute.) Web 应用程序可能包含如果 HTML 呈现更改将无法正常运行的代码。A Web application might include code that would not function correctly if HTML rendering changes. 若要避免此问题，可以设置`controlRenderingCompatibilityVersion`属性`pages`Web.config 文件，以指示你想要保持与兼容性的早期版本中的元素。To avoid this problem, you can set the `controlRenderingCompatibilityVersion` attribute of the `pages` element in the Web.config file to indicate which earlier version you want to maintain compatibility with. 例如，如果你设置属性`3.5`，已禁用控件将呈现`disabled`属性而不是 CSS 类。For example, if you set the property to `3.5`, a disabled control will render a `disabled` attribute and not a CSS class. > [!NOTE] > 你可以将此属性设置为最早版本是`3.5`。The earliest version that you can set this property to is `3.5`. 若要维护向后兼容，当你使用 Visual Studio 从早期版本升级到 ASP.NET 4 的 Web 项目时，Visual Studio 会自动设置`controlRenderingCompatibilityVersion`到 Web.config 文件中的属性`3.5`。To maintain backward compatibility, when you use Visual Studio to upgrade a Web project to ASP.NET 4 from an earlier version, Visual Studio automatically sets the `controlRenderingCompatibilityVersion` attribute in the Web.config file to `3.5`. 如果你想要使用 ASP.NET 4 中引入的算法呈现 HTML 的升级的 Web 站点，你可以更改或删除`controlRenderingCompatibilityVersion`属性。If you want an upgraded Web site to render HTML using the algorithm that was introduced in ASP.NET 4, you can change or remove the `controlRenderingCompatibilityVersion` attribute. 大多数情况下，此属性控制的行为是自动，则不需要检查在代码中的属性。Most of the time, the behavior controlled by this property is automatic and you do not have to check the property in your code. 但是，如果正在自定义控件进行编程，你可能需要包括将根据此属性的设置的控件的行为更改的代码。However, if you are programming a custom control, you might have to include code that alters the control's behavior based on the setting of this property. 例如，为 ASP.NET 4 的自定义控件可能组成控件和自定义控件可能通过生成更改的 JavaScript 代码来指定控件的已禁用的外观`aspNetDisabled`类。For example, a custom control for ASP.NET 4 might be composed of controls, and the custom control might specify the disabled appearance of the control by generating JavaScript code that alters the `aspNetDisabled` class. 这将作为预期如果工作是`4.0`或更高版本。This will work as expected if is `4.0` or later. 但若要获取相同时生效是`3.5`，自定义控件的代码必须设置控件的`CssClass`属性设置为"aspNetDisabled"时属性是`false`。But to get the same effect when is `3.5`, the custom control's code must set the control's `CssClass` property to "aspNetDisabled" when the property is `false`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`relativeUrl`参数包含一个绝对 URL，URL 不经更改即返回。If the `relativeUrl` parameter contains an absolute URL, the URL is returned unchanged. 如果`relativeUrl`参数包含相对 URL，则 URL 将变为适合当前的请求路径，以便浏览器可以解析 URL 的相对 URL。If the `relativeUrl` parameter contains a relative URL, that URL is changed to a relative URL that is correct for the current request path, so that the browser can resolve the URL. 例如，考虑以下情况：For example, consider the following scenario: - 客户端已请求 ASP.NET 页，其中包含有与之关联的映像的用户控件。A client has requested an ASP.NET page that contains a user control that has an image associated with it. - ASP.NET 页位于 /Store/page1.aspx。The ASP.NET page is located at /Store/page1.aspx. - 用户控件位于 /Store/UserControls/UC1.ascx。The user control is located at /Store/UserControls/UC1.ascx. - 图像文件位于 /UserControls/Images/Image1.jpg。The image file is located at /UserControls/Images/Image1.jpg. 如果用户控件将映像 (即，/Store/UserControls/Images/Image1.jpg) 的相对路径传递给方法，该方法将返回值 /Images/Image1.jpg。If the user control passes the relative path to the image (that is, /Store/UserControls/Images/Image1.jpg) to the method, the method will return the value /Images/Image1.jpg. 此方法使用属性解析为的绝对 URL。This method uses the property to resolve to the absolute URL. 返回的 URL 仅供客户端使用。The returned URL is for client use. 有关 Web 站点中的资源路径的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 项目路径](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2447f50c-b849-483c-8093-85ed53e7a5bd)。For more information on resource paths in a Web site, see [ASP.NET Web Project Paths](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2447f50c-b849-483c-8093-85ed53e7a5bd). > [!NOTE] > 移动 Web 页仅，如果你的应用程序依赖于无 cookie 会话，或者可能会收到来自移动浏览器的要求无 cookie 会话的请求，使用波形符 ("~") 在路径可能导致无意中创建新的会话并有可能丢失会话数据。For mobile Web pages only, if your application relies on cookieless sessions or might receive requests from mobile browsers that require cookieless sessions, using a tilde ("~") in a path can result in inadvertently creating a new session and potentially losing session data. 设置具有路径的属性，如"~ /*路径"*，通过调用解析路径具有自变量，如"~ /*路径"*之前将其分配给属性。To set a property with a path such as "~/*path"*, resolve the path by calling the with an argument such as "~/*path"* before assigning it to the property. ## Examples 下面的示例创建Web 服务器控件对象，并使用方法将路径设置到映像存储属性。The following example creates an Web server control object and uses the method to set the path to the image, which is stored by the property. [!code-csharp[Control_ResolveUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Control_ResolveUrl/CS/control_resolveurl.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Control_ResolveUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Control_ResolveUrl/VB/control_resolveurl.vb#1)]

summary.span: 保存将页面回发到服务器之后发生的所有服务器控件状态更改。

span.span: Saves any server control state changes that have occurred since the time the page was posted back to the server.

returns.span: 返回服务器控件的当前状态。

span.span: Returns the server control's current state.

returns.span: 如果没有与该控件关联的状态，则此方法返回 。

span.span: If there is no state associated with the control, this method returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法以将保存所需的特定控件的操作的状态信息。Use the method to save state information required for the operation of a specific control. 此控件状态数据从控件的视图状态数据分开存储。This control-state data is stored separately from the control's view-state data. 使用控件状态的自定义控件必须调用方法之前保存控件状态。Custom controls using control state must call the method on the before saving control state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例替代自定义 ASP.NET 控件中的方法。The following code example overrides the method in a custom ASP.NET control. 当调用此方法时，它确定是否内部属性`currentIndex`设置为非默认值，并且如果是这样，将值保存到控件状态。When this method is invoked, it determines whether the internal property `currentIndex` is set to a non-default value and, if so, saves the value to control state. 重写方法以调用方法以指示该自定义控件使用控件状态。The method is overridden to call the method on the to indicate that the custom control uses control state. [!code-csharp[ControlState#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlState/CS/controlstatecs.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[ControlState#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlState/VB/controlstatevb.aspx#1)]

para.span: 保存控件状态后，一个字符串对象返回到客户端作为变量存储在 HTML元素。

span.span: When control state is saved, a string object is returned to the client as a variable that is stored in an HTML element.

para.span: 重写此方法以提取要在控件中使用的状态信息。

span.span: Override this method to extract the state information to use in your control.

para.span: 控件状态旨在用于少量的关键数据，如页索引或关键字。

span.span: Control state is intended for small amounts of critical data, such as a page index or a keyword.

para.span: 将控件状态用于大量的数据可以产生不良影响页的性能。

span.span: Using control state for large amounts of data can adversely affect page performance.

para.span: 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce)。

span.span: For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce).

summary.span: 保存将页面回发到服务器之后发生的所有服务器控件视图状态更改。

span.span: Saves any server control view-state changes that have occurred since the time the page was posted back to the server.

returns.span: 返回服务器控件的当前视图状态。

span.span: Returns the server control's current view state.

returns.span: 如果没有与该控件关联的视图状态，则此方法返回 。

span.span: If there is no view state associated with the control, this method returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 视图状态是服务器控件的属性的值的累计。View state is the accumulation of the values of a server control's properties. 这些值会自动放置在服务器控件的属性，它是实例的类。These values are automatically placed in the server control's property, which is an instance of the class. 保存状态的服务器控件生命周期阶段后，此属性的值随后会保存到一个字符串对象。This property's value is then persisted to a string object after the save state stage of the server control life cycle. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 页面生命周期概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7949d756-1a79-464e-891f-904b1cfc7991)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Page Life Cycle Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7949d756-1a79-464e-891f-904b1cfc7991). 视图状态保存时，此字符串对象返回到客户端作为变量存储在 HTML`HIDDEN`元素。When view state is saved, this string object is returned to the client as a variable that is stored in an HTML `HIDDEN` element. 在创作一个自定义服务器的自定义视图状态时，可以显式管理的视图状态与和方法。When you author a custom server control with a custom view state, the view state can be managed explicitly with the and methods. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce)。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce). 有关实现自定义会话状态提供程序的信息，请参阅[实现会话状态存储提供程序](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66)。For information on implementing a custom session-state provider, see [Implementing a Session-State Store Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66). ## Examples 下面的示例重写自定义的 ASP.NET 服务器控件中的方法。The following example overrides the method in a custom ASP.NET server control. 当调用此方法时，它确定控件是否有任何子控件，以及是否包含对象是回发的结果。When this method is invoked, it determines whether the control has any child controls and whether the containing object is the result of a postback. 如果都为 true，它更改属性Web 服务器控件读取`Custom Control Has Saved State`。If both are true, it changes the property of a Web server control to read `Custom Control Has Saved State`. 它然后将控件的视图状态保存为一个数组对象，名为`allStates`。It then saves the view state of the control as an array of objects, named `allStates`. [!code-csharp[Control_StateManagement#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Control_StateManagement/CS/control_state.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Control_StateManagement#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Control_StateManagement/VB/control_state.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用控件的外观包含在主题目录中的一个或多个外观文件中。Skins available to a control are contained in one or more skin files in a theme directory. 属性指定哪些这些将应用于控件的外观。The property specifies which of these skins to apply to the control. 外观是特定于特定的控件;不能共享之间的不同类型的控件的外观设置。A skin is specific to a particular control; you cannot share skin settings between controls of different types. 如果你未设置属性，如果已定义控件使用的默认外观。If you do not set the property, a control uses the default skin if one is defined. 例如，如果而无需外观 ID 为定义控制，则该外观适用于所有控件，不显式引用它按 ID 的外观和，未设置为禁用的主题。For example, if a skin without an ID is defined for an control, then that skin applies to all controls that do not explicitly reference a skin by ID and that are not set to disable themes. 如果为定义具有 ID 的外观控制，则该外观仅适用于控制其属性设置为该 id。If a skin with an ID is defined for an control, then that skin applies only to controls whose property is set to that ID. 如果主题目录中的外观文件不包含具有指定的外观属性，在运行时引发异常。If the skin files in a theme directory do not contain a skin with the specified property, an exception is thrown at run time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定的路径包含当前控件的页或用户控件。The property specifies the path to the page or user control that contains the current control. 例如，如果 Web 页位于http://www.contoso.com/application/subdirectory、属性返回"应用程序/子目录"。For example, if the Web page resides at http://www.contoso.com/application/subdirectory, the property returns "application/subdirectory". 返回相对于应用程序虚拟路径 ("~ / 子目录")，使用属性。To return the application-relative virtual path ("~/subdirectory"), use the property. ## Examples 下面的示例使用属性两次。The following example uses the property twice. 第一次在中使用方法调用，以获取在其中控件所在的目录的路径。The first time it is used in a method call to obtain the path to the directory in which the control resides. 在第二次方法调用，以获取该目录中包含的所有文件的列表。The second time it is in a method call to obtain the list of all the files contained within that directory. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法的末尾自动调用中服务器控件的生命周期事件。This method is called automatically at the end of the event in the server control's lifecycle. 当你开发模板化数据绑定控件时，请调用此方法。Invoke this method when you develop templated data-bound controls. 此方法提醒 ASP.NET 监视服务器控件的视图状态，则重写时是必需的更改方法。This method alerts ASP.NET to monitor changes to a server control's view state, which is required when you override the method. ## Examples 下面的示例重写自定义的 ASP.NET 服务器控件中的方法。The following example overrides the method in a custom ASP.NET server control. 它首先调用基方法，然后使用方法来删除所有子控件和方法以都删除所有视图状态的设置保存这些子控件。It begins by calling the base method and then uses the method to delete all the child controls and the method to delete any saved view-state settings for those child controls. 最后，属性设置为`true`。Finally, the property is set to `true`. 然后，该控件使用属性来确定是否为控件启用视图状态更改跟踪。The control then uses the property to determine whether view-state change tracking is enabled for the control. 如果未启用，调用方法。If it is not enabled, the method is called. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性不同于中的属性属性包含服务器控件的命名容器的标识符。This property differs from the property, in that the property includes the identifier for the server control's naming container. 处理的页面请求时，将自动生成此标识符。This identifier is generated automatically when a page request is processed. 此属性是特别重要区分重复的数据绑定服务器控件中包含的服务器控件。This property is particularly important in differentiating server controls contained within a data-binding server control that repeats. 重复的控制，它们是， ， ， ，和Web 服务器控件 （或你创建包含数据绑定时重复功能的任何自定义服务器控件），作为服务命名及其子控件的容器。The repeating control, which are , , , , and Web server controls (or any custom server controls that you create that include repeating functionality when data bound), serves as the naming container for its child controls. 这意味着它的唯一命名空间为创建它的子控件，以便其属性值不会发生冲突。This means that it creates a unique namespace for its child controls so that their property values do not conflict. 例如，如果包括 ASP.NET Web 服务器控件中的服务器控件和分配控件属性值`MyLabel`，和的`MyRepeater`.For example, if you include an ASP.NET Web server control in a server control, and assign the control an property value of `MyLabel`, and the an of `MyRepeater`. 如果你将数据绑定到到具有三个项，生成的对象的每个实例的属性服务器控件是`MyRepeater$ctl00$MyLabel`， `MyRepeater$ctl01$MyLabel`，和`MyRepeater$ctl02$MyLabel`。If you bind data to the to an object with three entries, the resulting properties for each instance of the server controls are `MyRepeater$ctl00$MyLabel`, `MyRepeater$ctl01$MyLabel`, and `MyRepeater$ctl02$MyLabel`. ## Examples 下面的示例创建对象和三个文本字符串，并用其填充它，然后将绑定Web 服务器控件中的数据加载页时。The following example creates an object and populates it with three text strings, then binds a Web server control to the data in the when the page is loaded. 此代码可获取为每个数据绑定生成的子控件的属性。The code gets the property for each child control generated during data binding. 在代码中生成三个版本的控件并将其`UniqueID`属性值写入页面。The code generates three versions of the control and writes their `UniqueID` property values to the page. [!code-aspx-csharp[AccessingAspNetControlsProgramaticallyConcepts#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AccessingAspNetControlsProgramaticallyConcepts/CS/WebFormsControlIdResolution12.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[AccessingAspNetControlsProgramaticallyConcepts#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AccessingAspNetControlsProgramaticallyConcepts/VB/WebFormsControlIdResolution12.aspx#2)]

summary.span: 获取状态信息的字典，这些信息使您可以在同一页的多个请求间保存和还原服务器控件的视图状态。

span.span: Gets a dictionary of state information that allows you to save and restore the view state of a server control across multiple requests for the same page.

value.span: 包含服务器控件视图状态信息的 类的实例。

span.span: An instance of the class that contains the server control's view-state information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 服务器控件的视图状态是其所有属性值的累计。A server control's view state is the accumulation of all its property values. 若要在 HTTP 请求之间保留这些值，ASP.NET 服务器控件使用此属性，它是实例的类中，以存储属性值。In order to preserve these values across HTTP requests, ASP.NET server controls use this property, which is an instance of the class, to store the property values. 处理后续请求时，值是作为变量传递给 HTML 隐藏输入元素。The values are then passed as a variable to an HTML hidden input element when subsequent requests are processed. 有关保存服务器控件视图状态的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce)。For more information about saving server control view state, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce). 默认情况下，情况下，启用所有服务器控件的视图状态但是某些情况下在其中你将想要禁用它。View state is enabled for all server controls by default, but there are circumstances in which you will want to disable it. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 性能概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f882bf1b-a009-4312-ac06-74370ffabc0b)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Performance Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f882bf1b-a009-4312-ac06-74370ffabc0b). 有关字典和如何使用它们的信息，请参阅[集合和数据结构](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/60cc581f-1db5-445b-ba04-a173396bf872)。For information about dictionaries and how to use them, see [Collections and Data Structures](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/60cc581f-1db5-445b-ba04-a173396bf872). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何实现`Text`属性用于存储和检索其值从其控件属性。The following example demonstrates implementing a `Text` property that stores and retrieves its value from its control's property. span.span: Gets or sets the view-state mode of this control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用属性来启用的单个控件的视图状态，即使页禁用了视图状态。You can use the property to enable view state for an individual control even if view state is disabled for the page. 有关视图状态和控件状态的详细信息，请参阅属性。For more information about view state and control state, see the property. 若要禁用页面的视图状态并使其成为特定控件在页上，设置页面和控件的属性`true`，将其设置属性页面的到，并设置属性控制对。To disable view state for a page and to enable it for a specific control on the page, set the property of the page and the control to `true`, set the property of the page to , and set the property of the control to . 默认值属性页是。The default value of the property for a page is . 默认值在页中的 Web 服务器控件的属性是。The default value of the property for a Web server control in a page is . 因此，如果未设置此属性页或控制级别，值属性确定视图状态行为。As a result, if you do not set this property at either the page or the control level, the value of the property determines view-state behavior. 页或控件的属性具有效果才属性设置为`true`。The property of a page or a control has an effect only if the property is set to `true`. 如果属性设置为`false`，即使将关闭视图状态属性设置为。If the property is set to `false`, view state will be turned off even if the property is set to .

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示服务器控件是否作为 UI 呈现在页上。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a server control is rendered as UI on the page.

value.span: 如果控件在页上可见，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the control is visible on the page; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此属性为`false`，不呈现服务器控件。If this property is `false`, the server control is not rendered. 组织你页的布局时，应考虑到这种情况。You should take this into account when organizing the layout of your page. > [!NOTE] > 如果不呈现容器控件，即使你设置将不会呈现它包含任何控件到的单个控件的属性`true`。If a container control is not rendered, any controls that it contains will not be rendered even if you set the property of an individual control to `true`. 在这种情况下，单个控件返回`false`为属性即使你具有显式将其设置为`true`。In that case, the individual control returns `false` for the property even if you have explicitly set it to `true`. (即，如果`Visible`父控件的属性设置为`false`，子控件继承该设置，该设置将优先于任何本地设置。)(That is, if the `Visible` property of the parent control is set to `false`, the child control inherits that setting and the setting takes precedence over any local setting.)
